creator: deepakarun@gmail.com
text: I am seeing an intermittent issues where the user request is not getting thru to the backend server which is weblogic directed from apache webserver.I am seeing this error happens only if i use form POST method and not with GET method. I would llike to see the request value in apache before redirecting to weblogic. Where would I get the mod_dumpio.so file which I could use to check my posted data by setting log to bebug level.

creator: covener@gmail.com
